# sceneUserInfoKey

**Type Property**

A key that reflects the new locked state.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated class let sceneUserInfoKey: String
```

## Discussion

The `userInfo` dictionary of the notification contains the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPointerLockState/sceneUserInfoKey] key, which reflects the new value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPointerLockState/isLocked] property.

## Updating the Lock State

- **didChangeNotification**: A notification that posts when the value of the locked state for a scene changes.
